text: Casino da Madeira (Casino of Madeira) is a casino located in Funchal, Madeira, Portugal, which is part of the hotel Pestana Casino Park. It was designed by Brazilian architect Oscar Niemeyer and it opened in 1976. Entrance to the casino is done in a Portuguese pavement style ==External links== *Official website == References == Category:1976 establishments in Portugal Category:Casinos in Portugal Category:Buildings and structures in Funchal Category:Tourist attractions in Funchal Category:Casinos completed in 1976
title: Casino da Madeira
